content.question: A refugee enters the European Union in Italy and is temporarily housed in Germany. He is then granted asylum and is permanently settled in Sweden. Which of the following describes this type of migration that is facilitated by the European Union’s open border policies?

choices.label: Chain migration within the refugee’s family and social network
Guest worker migration based upon the free movement of labor
As an internally displaced person within a single state
Step migration across member states to a final destination
As a rural-to-urban migrant seeking employment opportunities

content.answer: Step migration across member states to a final destination
